data.message: Hey I have sent a few messages about an issue I'm having can someone please respond?

replies.message: Hey Karl. If something's not working with your Facebook, or you think there's an issue, you can report it to us here: http://bit.ly/2sMaiHz. Thanks! -Stephanie
That's great and all... But the issue I'm having is not on that board so can someone please just respond to the message I sent in....
That's great and all... But the issue I'm having is not on that board so can someone please just respond to the message I sent in....
Facebook help is worthless a bunch of robotic answers get us no where
Grant Glass They have ignored me and my friends over half a week
Doesn't matter when you report a bug. I've reported one twice thats been happening for a year or 2. No reply ever. And no reply to messages.
Really sick of non answered reports to Facebook. 3 days im trying to upload my captured video,it blocked with note "Copyrighting". 😡
Will send reports without stop until they will not answer or solve that issue. I have to. What i have to do.
Facebook Another sicko page FB is leaving up after numerous reporting:  https://www.facebook.com/groups/1021483601321166/?hc_location=ufi
Facebook Pls Advise if you can help me with our Business page issue.... Its crucial and Have not gotten a response from you... PLs Pls pls advise to the several reports I have submitted.
Thanks for reaching out, Rivera. If you've submitted a report to our team, please sit tight while we take the time to review it. We appreciate your patience. -Jessica
Facebook Thank you so Much Jessica
Facebook can you respond to me with a real answer at some point...
Face book has never helped me with my problem and I've asked many times

Why did you boot me and my admin from FB for posting a pic of David Tennant's fully clothed bottom from Doctor Who when you allow all but naked photos of women butts on Facebook. This is sexism. I have asked for help for months and been ignored. Facebook says it cares about treating people fairly but they don't. Clothed men's bottoms from >>>Doctor Who<<< don't meet "community standards" according you what I was told but naked behinds of women do.  THIS IS SEXISM.
معرفه الشخص الذي تابعني باسم رياض قرارة
All i need is for my age to be changed back from what it was before I was hacked. it was 1.5 months ago.

I have a request regarding creating a username of a business page. I managed a public business page. I tried to make a username, but I couln't creat a username even though I met all conditions that your guideline said. Whenever I tried to make one, there is a pop up like 'You are not eligible to creat a username.' 

For your information, the page I manage is for public organisation, and I can not use the method for verifying the account by using mobile phone. In this case, are there any methods that I can deal with?
